archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.4.6a: a) restricting administrator access (e.g. to SAN management consoles and NAS device utilities) to a limited number of authorised staff (e.g. storage administrators)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
